history.content: Are your friends EECS? I know some majors already chose their advisors, but I don't think it opens up for EECS majors until Wednesday.

Important Dates:

- Now through Wednesday 9:59am: Continuing students should access the web app to see their advising session(s) and check if they can attend. They will have the option keep their adviser from last semester, reset their preference to “blank”, or opt out of participating via the Faculty Advising web app. If you wish to keep your adviser, select the faculty’s name and click “Save”.  If you want to change your adviser, select "(blank)" and click "Save". If you choose to select a new adviser, you will be able to do so beginning Wednesday at 10am

-Wednesday 4/5 @ 10am: Sign-ups for all students will occur on a first-come, first-served basis on the Faculty Advising web app. All students must access the web app, even if just to opt out.

o IMPORTANT: Students are responsible for selecting an advising time that does not conflict with their schedule. Please make your selections wisely.

If you had an assigned adviser, but now don't, that means your faculty adviser's allocation has decreased or s/he is on leave.

children.subject: Is there anyway to opt out if the deadline's passed and you can't make your appointment?

history.content: When I open the portal I get this? My friends all have an option bar to keep/change?
history.subject: I don't have the option to keep/change my adviser? Is this normal?

history.content: When I open the portal I get this?
history.subject: Can't choose faculty advisor
